means: 诅咒(damn的过去式和过去分词)

sentence.Network_en: She has a first-class brain and is a damned good writer.
sentence.Network_cn: 她头脑相当灵光，是个非常棒的作家。

sentence.Network_en: We are making a damned good profit, I tell you that.
sentence.Network_cn: 我告诉你，我们现在正他妈的大赚特赚。

sentence.Network_en: As a second lieutenant, he had to salute damned near everybody.
sentence.Network_cn: 身为少尉，他几乎是逢人便得敬礼。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 高中英语单词速记及句型精练... ... damn;v. 咒骂；指责; 联想： damned 被诅咒的；该死的; pattern;n. 模式；方式；典型；式样;近义 …
Nothing really matters... ... No. Okay,just please go with the flow (随波逐流, 有样学样). frigging=damned 要命的,该死的).

list.abs: 英语骂人脏话大全(from ndi) ... 你这个猪！— You pig! 天杀的！— God damn ! 伪君子！— You hypocrite.
damiana 达米阿那damn well 非常地-
nimble的意思中文翻译 ... damn 谴责 damn all [口]根本没有一点也不 damn well 非常地,很.
英语骂人脏话大全(from ndi) ... 109. Nonsense! 鬼话！ 该死的东西！— Damn you! 闭嘴！— Shut your Big mouth! Shut up.
鬼泣4但丁经典语录 - 已解决 - 搜搜问问 ... Now leave! 赶紧滚！ Damn you! 该死的你！ You're wasting time! 你这是在浪费时间！.

encyclopedia.content: damned [dæmd] 词义 adj. 该死的，被咒骂的；使人憎厌的，糟透的 adv. 非常，十分，极 n. 被诅咒下地狱的人 动词damn的过去式和过去分词形式 例句用于感叹 1. You damned fool! 你这个该死的笨蛋！ 2. I'll be damned! 真想不到！ 3. Well I'll is damned: she won after all! 好家伙，她居然胜了！ 4. Well, I'll be damned, my watch has stopped. 该死，我的表又停了。 用于陈述 5. She did her damned to get it do

entry.tran: 该死的;他妈的;十足的;完全的
entry.def: Damned is used by some people to emphasize what they are saying, especially when they are angry or frustrated.

example.tran: 这个该死的会议似乎永远也开不完。
他们真是十足的讨厌鬼。

entry.def: According to some religions, the damned are people whose punishment is to stay in hell for ever after they have died.

If someone says 'I'm damned if I'm going to do it' or 'I'll be damned if I'll do it', they are emphasizing that they do not intend to do something and think it is unreasonable for anyone to expect them to do it.
Some people say 'I'll be damned!' when they are expressing surprise at something.

means.word_mean: 1. people who are condemned to eternal punishment;

sentences.sentence: "he felt he had visited the realm of the damned"
"I'll be damned (or blessed or darned or goddamned) if I'll do any such thing"
"he's a damn (or goddam or goddamned) fool"

means.word_mean: 2. in danger of the eternal punishment of hell;

slang.tokens: I’ll be damned. (=I’ll be dipped! I’ll be a monkey’s uncle!)

example.en: I'll be a monkey's uncle if you put that over on me!
example.zh: 我要是服了你，我就不是人!

auth_sentence.content: Too often Carragher has been damned with faint praise.
auth_sentence.res_content: Too often Carragher has been damned with faint praise.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Too often Carragher has been damned with faint praise.

auth_sentence.content: 'Re going to have to be pretty damned imaginative?
auth_sentence.res_content: 'Re going to have to be pretty damned imaginative?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: 'Re going to have to be pretty damned imaginative?

auth_sentence.content: By a figurative...speech he declareth the horror...of the damned.
auth_sentence.res_content: By a figurative...speech he declareth the horror...of the damned.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: By a figurative...speech he declareth the horror...of the damned.

sentences.cn: 所有的罪犯都该咒骂吗?

means.word_mean: (表示惊奇)真没想到，真叫我吃惊

sentences.en: Well, I’ll be damned! isn’t that Sarah Parker over there?
sentences.cn: 真叫我吃惊， 那不是萨拉·帕克吗？

sentences.en: I’m damned if I will lend any money to that lazy son of mine.
sentences.cn: 我决不会借钱给我那个懒鬼儿子。

sentences.en: ‘Why is she so late?’ ‘I’ll be blowed if I know.’
sentences.cn: “她为什么这么晚才来？”“鬼知道！”
